alert.note: Alert for Eastern Sawatch Mountains above 11000 Ft; Saguache County East of Continental Divide below 10000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 30 at 3:08PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Fremont and north central Saguache Counties through 345 PM MDT... At 308 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Villa Grove, or 17 miles southwest of Hayden Pass Burn Scar, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Western Hayden Pass Burn Scar and Villa Grove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Sawatch Mountains above 11000 Ft; Saguache County East of Continental Divide below 10000 Ft
